alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chemung and southwestern Tioga Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lockwood, or 7 miles north of Waverly, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Owego, Candor, Spencer, Van Etten, Lockwood, West Candor, Owens Mill and Catatonk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York.
